block.p: Randy Nadine Hersh and Patrick Geoffrey Hanlon are to be married today by Rabbi Zvi Dershowitz at the Loews Santa Monica Beach Hotel in Santa Monica, Calif.

The bride is the vice president for team marketing and business operations of the National Basketball Association in New York. She graduated cum laude from the University of San Francisco and received a master's degree in sports administration from the University of Southern California. She is the daughter of Joan Hersh of Santa Monica and Robert Hersh of Thousand Oaks, Calif.

The bride is the vice president for team marketing and business operations of the National Basketball Association in New York. She graduated cum laude from the University of San Francisco and received a master's degree in sports administration from the University of Southern California. She is the daughter of Joan Hersh of Santa Monica and Robert Hersh of Thousand Oaks, Calif.

The bridegroom is the vice president for communications of the New York Giants football team in East Rutherford, N.J. He graduated from the University of Pittsburgh. He is the son of James Hanlon of Chambersburg, Pa., and the late Marilyn Virginia May Hanlon. The bridegroom's previous marriage ended in divorce.
The couple were introduced in 1997 at a Knicks game.
